it.jrc.lt.core.component

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.jrc.lt.core.component.Component
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractFlatPatternMatcher, AbstractGazetteer, AbstractMatcher, AbstractMorphology, AbstractScanner, AbstractSentenceSplitter, AbstractTokenizer

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
implements Storable
    This class implements the base class for text processing components.
    Author:
    Jakub Piskorski

      • compile

        public boolean compile(Configuration configuration,
                       java.lang.String fileName)
        This method initializes the component via compilation of resources specified in the component configuration and saves the binary representation to a given file.
        Parameters:
        configuration - component configuration object
        fileName - name of the file to store the component resources
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, or false otherwise.
